class.name: panda_cartesian_impedance/DualArmCartesianImpedanceExampleController
class.description: A controller that renders Cartesian impedance based tracking of separate target poses for 2 panda arms.

class.name: panda_cartesian_impedance/CartesianIKController
class.description: A simple damped least square IK cartesian controller.

class.name: panda_cartesian_impedance/CartesianPDController
class.description: A cartesian PD impedance controller copied from Polymetis.
